title: OJ and Mayo's for Sale Many Tough variations

posts.post_title: OJ and Mayo's for Sale Many Tough variations
posts.post_content:
Posted By: david
a few cards up for sale

N300 Mayo Ward Retired SGC 10 $400------Sold-----------------------
N300 Stockdale PSA2mk $300--------------Sold-----------------------
N300 Haddock -no team variation. card grades technically good but appears ex,
     down graded due to two horizontal creases which do not break the 
     surface $325-----------------------Sold------------------------
N300 Daily PSA1mk with some staining(probably could be removed) one of the 
          toughest cards in the set $250
N172 OJ Dunn GAI 2 Chicago Maroons, Great photo downgraded because of 
          the pencil writing on the back $500
N172 OJ Clark and Hughes, double player card, exceptional photo, downgraded 
          to SGC 20 because of scrap book removal $1000
N172 OJ Charles Reipschlager (Ripslager) SGC 30 nice card, photo a touch 
          light, rarely offered outside of auctions $2000

I will cover shipping priority and insured mail to the US
